typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['Sales/SalesOrderHeader.parquet']) ~> SrcSalesOrderHeader
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['Sales/SalesOrderDetail.parquet']) ~> SrcSalesOrderDetail
SrcSalesOrderHeader, SrcSalesOrderDetail join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSalesOrderDetails
